refsect2.title: ucil_create_font_object ()
refsect2.para: Creates a font object required for text operations. The application must free the font object with ucil_destroy_font_object.

listitem.simpara: name of font or NULL to use default font

refsect2.title: ucil_draw_text ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ucil_draw_text (unicap_data_buffer_t *dest, ucil_color_t *color, ucil_font_object_t *fobj, const char *text, int x, int y);
refsect2.para: Draws a text string onto the target buffer.

listitem.simpara: an ucil_color_t. The colorspace of the color has to match the colorspace of the data_buffer.

refsect2.title: ucil_destroy_font_object ()
refsect2.para: Frees all resources allocated by the font object

refsect2.para: Determines the size in pixels a text string will take up when drawn onto a buffer.

listitem.simpara: pointer to int which will receive the width of the text
pointer to int which will receive the height of the text

refsect2.para: Reads the pixel at position (x,y) and stores the result in color.

listitem.simpara: pointer to an ucil_color_t to store the result

refsect2.title: ucil_convert_buffer ()
refsect2.para: Convert the colorspace of a data buffer. The colorspaces are denoted by the buffer.format.fourcc field. The dest->format.fourcc gets set to the correct value.

listitem.simpara: STATUS_SUCCESS if the buffer could be converted successfully. STATUS_FAILURE if no conversion exists.

refsect2.para: Gets the ucil_colorspace_t that matches the fourcc.

listitem.simpara: an ucil_colorspace_t. This is UCIL_COLORSPACE_UNKNOWN when no conversion exists.

refsect2.title: ucil_create_video_file ()
refsect2.programlisting: ucil_video_file_object_t * ucil_create_video_file (const char *path, unicap_format_t *format, const char *codec, ...);
refsect2.para: Creates a video file to be used for video recording. After creation, add frames to the video file with ucil_encode_frame.

listitem.simpara: codec name or NULL to use default codec
A new ucil_video_file_object_t or NULL on error.

refsect2.para: Adds a frame to a video file.

listitem.simpara: STATUS_SUCCESS if the frame got added successfully.

refsect2.title: ucil_close_video_file ()
refsect2.para: Close a video file created with ucil_create_video_file

refsect2.title: ucil_open_video_file ()
refsect2.para: Opens a video file for playback. The resulting handle can be used like a video capture device.

listitem.simpara: pointer to an unicap_handle_t where the new handle gets stored.
full path of the video file

refsect2.title: ucil_get_video_file_extension ()
refsect2.para: Get the file extension of a codec. Eg. for the "ogg/theora" codec, this will return "ogg". The returned string is owned by ucil and should not be freed.
